title: Best of The Herd: 02/12/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 02/12/2019
description:
Colin criticizes the NBA media for focusing on Russell Westbrook's meaningless streak of triple-doubles instead of how good Paul George is or how bad Westbrook’s shooting percentage is. With Kyler Murray, he sees a lot of sizzle but not a lot of steak.  Plus, The MMQB's Albert Breer talks about Antonio Brown's trade request and why certain teams that need a WR might not want to deal with him.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
